effect.sun_moon: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
